title: I want to replace my glass
content: I have Google pixel 2xl mobile. My screen glass is broken. And i want to repair it. But I did not found any service center details. I got to B2X do that and it is authorised by Google. I put mail to them about 8 days ago but didn't get any response from them. Can you please tell me how it would be done. Attached my broker glass images. Need urgent assistance in this.
